article_title: Covenant House rescues young from homelessness for 25 years
article_text:
Donations to Covenant House in Atlantic City may be sent to 929 Atlantic Ave., Atlantic City, NJ 08401.

A fundraising “sleep-out” will be held March 12.

Volunteers and businesses are needed to mentor and provide job-training for residents.

Call Jennifer Williams at 609-348-4070.

og.description: ATLANTIC CITY — Father Stephen Siniari remembers first coming to Atlantic City in the early 1990s to help homeless young adults.
